title: 9News Sydney | Saturday January 10 | Full Episode
description: In tonightâ€™s 9News Sydney update with Charles Croucher, Australia faces a multi-state weather emergency. A State of Disaster has been declared in Victoria as bushfires destroy over 130 homes. Sydney and regional NSW swelter through a record 43Â°C heatwave, while North Queensland prepares for Tropical Cyclone Koji, now upgraded to Category 2.  We also cover the latest in the Merrylands shooting investigation, a major probe into AI-generated explicit content on X (Twitter), and a dangerous "car surfing" incident in the M8 Tunnel. title: 9News Melbourne | Saturday January 10 | Full Episode
description: Victoria is in a State of Disaster as a catastrophic bushfire emergency grips the state. This full bulletin from 9 News Melbourne, presented by Stephanie Anderson, provides extensive coverage of the 10 major fire fronts that have already claimed over 300,000 hectares.  From the total loss of homes in Harcourt and the historic school in Ruffy to the heroic efforts of CFA volunteers in Alexandra and the Wimmera, we bring you the latest local reports. This bulletin also covers a major investigation into a custody death in Craigieburn, Victoria Policeâ€™s sudden reversal on  stop-and-search powers, and the results from the iconic Lorne Pier to Pub swim. title: 9News Adelaide | Saturday January 10 | Full Episode
description: Stay up to date with the latest from 9 News Adelaide, leading with a major bushfire emergency in Victoria. A state of disaster has been declared as out-of-control blazes scorch hundreds of thousands of hectares and destroy over 130 structures.  This bulletin also covers breaking local news, including a police anti-corruption arrest, a dramatic car theft pursuit in Adelaide's north, and the looming threat of Cyclone Koji in North Queensland. Plus, relief is on the way for South Australians as a cool change finally arrives to break the intense heatwave. title: 9News Brisbane | Saturday January 10 | Full Episode
description: Tonight on 9 News, we track Category 2 Cyclone Koji as it approaches the North Queensland coast, with residents between Ingham and Bowen urged to seek shelter immediately. Meanwhile, a State of Disaster has been declared in Victoria as out-of-control bushfires destroy homes and threaten communities. Plus, the latest on a Gold Coast surf tragedy and Robert Irwinâ€™s return home.
